answers.answer: I have swollen hands but from what I've read online unless its really really bad swelling and swelling in your face then it could be preclepcia take advantage of thr blood pressure machines at the store and check

I have had it before and may be getting it again. Sometimes when I wake up my fingers pop open like I have arthritis or something happened last pregnancy too. My face looks a lil swollen. But not my hands n feet. Last pregnancy I was swollen bad. Mention it to ur doctor if u think its a problem. And yes take advantage of the blood pressure machines.
Bring this up to your Dr , everything you named are symptoms of preeclampsiaGood luck hun.

question: So idk if im paranoid but my hands feel a little more swollen and my fingers hurt to bend I also am dizzy and have a headache. Are those signs for it or are they kinda normal
title: preeclempsia
